author: Lon.TV
description:
Sign up for a Plex Pass: https://lon.tv/plexpass - In a followup to my Plex Pro Week video, I take a look at a simpler and free way to create automations using the Plex Pass webhook feature. See more Plex: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIvqJPAmMooCKOHieLdi3I7o and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

Links: 
Plex Pro Week: https://www.plex.tv/pro-week/
My Plex Pro Week Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s4SFeEJuzek
Plex API Info : https://www.plex.tv/blog/plex-pro-week-25-api-unlocked/

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:49 - Price
01:56 - About Plex Webhooks
03:04 - Make.com Step 1: Add Scenario
04:40 - Adding Webhook to Plex
05:51 - Receiving our first webhook from Plex
06:29 - Parsing Plex data
07:43 - Setting up a Make.com route based on player state
11:24 - Running the workflow
12:08 - Adding a media.stop event
13:50 - Other simple webhook services

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

Subscribe to my email lists!

title: Plex Pro Week Followup: Webhooks on a Free, No Code Platform!
